entry.title: Connect serial port to print text
The buzzer reports the time based on the student ID
LED lighting program
entry.content:
# LED lighting program

# 设计要求

  • 用按键控制 LED 发光类型
  • 按 KEY1，控制 LED 灯在 “红光 - 绿光 - 蓝光 - 白光” 四种方式之间切换
  • 按 KEY2，控制 LED 灯熄灭

# 设计思路

# \Hardware\beep

# beep.c

# beep.h

# \Project

# Delay.c

# Dlay.h

# newstart.c

# main.c

# bsp_led.c

# bsp_led.h
